item.Name: The HS.fi News and Comments Corpus
item.Description: This corpus contains the domestic news of the Helsingin Sanomat website and their comments from 5 September 2011 to 4 September 2012. The corpus has been syntactically parsed using TDT alpha. The corpus is available for download from META-SHARE (the Finnish Language Bank) and for online browsing through the concordancer Korp.
